narrative:
This 2nd pre-license inspection and exit briefing for a Class A license were conducted with the applicant.
No non-compliant items were identified during this inspection.
The applicant will submit a copy of this report along with the license fee to the Regional Office.  The applicant will
also submit a microchip approval form and a letter requesting a variance to use an electronic version of APHIS
Forms 7005 and 7006.
REGULATED ACTIVITIES CAN NOT BE PERFORMED UNTIL A CERTIFICATE HAS BEEN ISSUED BY THE
REGIONAL OFFICE.
